verbs.description: Trump [V: is] replacing his lawyer with an attorney who represented Bill Clinton throughout his impeachment .
[ARG0: Trump] is [V: replacing] [ARG1: his lawyer] [ARG2: with an attorney who represented Bill Clinton throughout his impeachment] .
Trump is replacing his lawyer with [ARG0: an attorney] [R-ARG0: who] [V: represented] [ARG1: Bill Clinton] [ARGM-TMP: throughout his impeachment] .
